verses.t: And it came to pass a long time after Lord that the had given rest unto Israel from all their enemies round about, that Joshua waxed old and stricken in age.
And Joshua called for all Israel, and for their elders, and for their heads, and for their judges, and for their officers, and said unto them, I am old and stricken in age:
And ye have seen Lord all that the your God hath done unto all these nations because Lord of you; for the your God is he that hath fought for you.
Behold, I have divided unto you by lot these nations that remain, to be an inheritance for your tribes, from Jordan, with all the nations that I have cut off, even unto the great sea westward.
Lord And the your God, he shall expel them from before you, and drive them from out of your sight; and ye shall possess their land, Lord as the your God hath promised unto you.
Be ye therefore very courageous to keep and to do all that is written in the book of the law of Moses, that ye turn not aside therefrom to the right hand or to the left;
That ye come not among these nations, these that remain among you; neither make mention of the name of their gods, nor cause to swear by them, neither serve them, nor bow yourselves unto them:
But cleave Lord unto the your God, as ye have done unto this day.
Lord For the hath driven out from before you great nations and strong: but as for you, no man hath been able to stand before you unto this day.Lordâ€¦: or, Then the Lord will drive
One man of you shall chase a thousand: Lord for the your God, he it is that fighteth for you, as he hath promised you.
Take good heed therefore unto yourselves, that ye love Lord the your God.
Else if ye do in any wise go back, and cleave unto the remnant of these nations, even these that remain among you, and shall make marriages with them, and go in unto them, and they to you:

Know for a certainty Lord that the your God will no more drive out any of these nations from before you; but they shall be snares and traps unto you, and scourges in your sides, and thorns in your eyes, until ye perish from off this good land Lord which the your God hath given you.

And, behold, this day I am going the way of all the earth: and ye know in all your hearts and in all your souls, that not one thing hath failed of all the good things Lord which the your God spake concerning you; all are come to pass unto you, and not one thing hath failed thereof.

that as all good things are come Lord upon you, which the your God promised Lord you; so shall the bring upon you all evil things, until he have destroyed you from off this good land Lord which the your God hath given you.

When ye have transgressed the covenant Lord of the your God, which he commanded you, and have gone and served other gods, and bowed yourselves to them; then shall the anger Lord of the be kindled against you, and ye shall perish quickly from off the good land which he hath given unto you.
